title: Can't launch alpa client :(

replies.body:
Do you continue to experience these same issues if you launch League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) within your install directory? You should find this file here:

> **(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)**

Thanks for replying but I have a mac and I already tried launching the game from lol.launcher and still the problem occurred. I tried sending the HRT logs in the support ticket but it told me that 20 megabits is the maximum size one can send. Thus I have no idea how to send more information regarding my logs to the tech support.

You can use [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#mq5) to grab some Patcher, Launcher and Kernel logs for our tech team. You can then attach them to your ticket.

Let me know if this helped!
